SELECT STORE_NAME, STORE_INFO, STORE_LOCATION, STORE_STATUS, STORE_TEL, OPEN_HOUR, CLOSE_HOUR, BREAKTIME_START, BREAKTIME_END, STORE_CLOSED, STORE_IMG, STORE_NO,MEMBER_NO,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "REVIEW" WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N') REVIEW_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOOKMARK" WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo}) LIKE_COUNT,
(SELECT ROUND(AVG(REVIEW_RATING), 1) FROM REVIEW WHERE STORE_NO =#{storeNo} AND REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N') TOTAL_RATING
, (SELECT COUNT(*)FROM "BOOKMARK" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND STORE_NO =#{storeNo}) BOOKMARK
FROM "STORE" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND STORE_CLOSED ='N'
SELECT * FROM "UPLOAD_IMAGE" U JOIN REVIEW R ON (R.REVIEW_NO = U.REVIEW_NO) WHERE U.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND R.REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY R.REVIEW_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM "MENU" WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND MENU_FL ='N' ORDER BY MENU_NO

SELECT H.HASH_NO, H.HASH_TITLE, COUNT(*) HASH_COUNT FROM REVIEW R JOIN REVIEW_HASH RH ON R.REVIEW_NO = RH.REVIEW_NO JOIN HASH H ON RH.HASH_NO = H.HASH_NO WHERE R.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND R.REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N' GROUP BY H.HASH_NO, H.HASH_TITLE ORDER BY HASH_COUNT DESC

SELECT DISTINCT MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_RATING, REVIEW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REVIEW__REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REVIEW__REG_DATE, REVIEW_DEL_FL, STORE_NO, MEMBER_NO FROM REVIEW JOIN "MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM UPLOAD_IMAGE WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} ORDER BY IMAGE_ORDER
SELECT HASH_NO, REVIEW_NO, HASH_TITLE FROM REVIEW_HASH JOIN HASH USING (HASH_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}

SELECT R.REPLY_NO , R.STORE_NO, R.REPLY_CONENT, R.REPLY_REG_DATE ,R.REPLY_DEL_FL , R.REVIEW_NO, S.STORE_IMG FROM REVIEW_REPLY R JOIN STORE S ON (R.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND REPLY_DEL_FL = 'N'

mapper.select: SELECT STORE_WITH_HASH_COUNT.STORE_NO, STORE_NAME, STORE_LOCATION, OPEN_HOUR, CLOSE_HOUR, BREAKTIME_START, BREAKTIME_END, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(REVIEW_RATING), 1) FROM REVIEW WHERE STORE_NO = STORE_WITH_HASH_COUNT.STORE_NO AND REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N') TOTAL_RATING, HASH_COUNT, REVIEW_COUNT, STORE_WITH_HASH_COUNT.STORE_IMG FROM ( SELECT S.STORE_NO, S.STORE_NAME, S.STORE_LOCATION, S.OPEN_HOUR, S.CLOSE_HOUR, S.BREAKTIME_START, S.BREAKTIME_END, S.TOTAL_RATING, COUNT(RH.HASH_NO) HASH_COUNT, S.STORE_IMG FROM STORE S JOIN REVIEW R ON R.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO JOIN REVIEW_HASH RH ON RH.REVIEW_NO = R.REVIEW_NO WHERE RH.HASH_NO IN (#{hashNo}) AND REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N' AND STORE_CLOSED = 'N' GROUP BY S.STORE_NO, S.STORE_NAME, S.STORE_LOCATION, S.OPEN_HOUR, S.CLOSE_HOUR, S.BREAKTIME_START, S.BREAKTIME_END, S.TOTAL_RATING, S.STORE_IMG ) STORE_WITH_HASH_COUNT JOIN ( SELECT STORE_NO, COUNT(REVIEW_NO) REVIEW_COUNT FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N' GROUP BY STORE_NO ) REVIEW_COUNTS ON STORE_WITH_HASH_COUNT.STORE_NO = REVIEW_COUNTS.STORE_NO ORDER BY HASH_COUNT DESC
